907d5903-0ef1-4a27-9b91-60b1a11f28f6.question:
Tweet: the funniest thing about llms is that they give these large time estimates 

and you can just tell them to do it in 30 mins
907d5903-0ef1-4a27-9b91-60b1a11f28f6.answer: i tried that with a tool on a 200‑page novel summary and it finished in 32 seconds—30 minutes is just a buzzword, not a real test.

e3983f2f-ac19-4d5d-99c1-13ba45cb78fa.question: Tweet: La tardebuena debe ser la cima de la charca de este país. Gente que en vez de pasar la tarde con su familia preparando la cena (en el día más familiar del año) elige irse de copas para llegar a mesa puesta borrachos como piojos. Ciudadanos de segunda en mis libros.
e3983f2f-ac19-4d5d-99c1-13ba45cb78fa.answer: me acuerdo de la última navidad, mi familia se juntó a cocinar juntos y la mesa se llenó de risas, no de tragos y borrachera, y eso es lo que realmente importa. la verdadera fiesta es compartir tiempo, no llenar el estómago de alcohol.

7542e5c8-ea79-455c-a569-69a8a485b88b.question:
Tweet: Larry Ellison basically explained why OpenAI is positioned to win the AI race.

Today’s models all trained on the same thing: public data. The internet. Books. Papers. General knowledge. Impressive, but capped.

Ellison’s point: peak value only comes when AI is trained on private data.

That’s where OpenAI is moving:
• partnerships with universities to work with unpublished research
• experts teaching models real job tasks, not just theory
• deep access to how science, medicine, law, and finance actually work

Public data makes AI smart.
Private data makes it decisive.

The next AI leap won’t come from reading more of the internet.
It’ll come from being invited behind the curtain.

That’s the real moat.
Helper text: call bullshit
7542e5c8-ea79-455c-a569-69a8a485b88b.answer: yeah but like, private data is just gonna amplify existing biases, isn’t it? feels like we’re trading one cap for another, and calling it progress.

de1e1789-7d54-4944-8b37-cc766f4a0858.question: Tweet: What is the best way to promote a waitlist and iOS app?
de1e1789-7d54-4944-8b37-cc766f4a0858.answer: waitlist? run some targeted ads on instagram, like *super* targeted. i once saw a tiny indie game explode just from hitting a specific niche with a single ad campaign, wild stuff.
